resources.string: To photograph a document, please grant us permission to use the camera
Ensure good lighting when photographing the invoice or remittance slip
Hold device parallel over the page
Capture the entire page within the frame shown on the camera screen
It\'s now possible to analyse an invoice with multiple pages!
Is the document complete, in focus and in the correct orientation?\n\nDouble-tap to check the focus.
Is the page order correct? Reorder by drag & drop.
Do you want to delete the last photo?
Capture the entire page within the frame shown on the camera screen
It\'s now possible to analyse an invoice with multiple pages
Hold device parallel over the page
No information could be extracted. Please take a new photo.
Now documents can be conveniently uploaded for analysis.
The document could not be opened. Please try a different document.
Permission to access files is required to upload saved invoices.
Permission to access files is required to analyse saved photos or PDFs.
Unfortunately, this Document could not be processed.
Only files of the formats jpg, png, gif or pdf can be analysed.
The document can only have a maximum of 10 pages.
Password protected documents cannot be analysed.
The document can only have a maximum of 10 pages.
Tips for best results from photos
For best extraction results, please apply the following tips for photos:
1-sided photos of format jpeg, png or gif
PDF documents of up to 10 pages
Paying digital invoices has now become even more convenient. Send a PDF invoice directly to <Partner App Name>. The document will automatically be analysed for payment transfer.
To do so, please select a PDF invoice from within your email app, PDF viewer or other app on your smartphone.

To forward the file to <Partner App Name>, use a function like "Open with...", "Send file..." or "Share" that is available within the app.\n\nThe "Share" function is often represented by an icon depicting a graph of three dots that are connected by two lines. These functions are often found in the overflow menu (three dots in the upper right corner of the screen) or in the function bar at the bottom edge of the app. In some email apps, the function is located near the PDF attachment before opening the file.
Select the <Partner App name> as the destination
When using this function, apps are shown to which you can send the PDF document. Please select the <Partner App Name> from the list, to start the analysis and payment process.
Please use the option \"JUST ONCE\" to prevent the <Partner App Name> from opening every PDF by default.

In case you notice that <Partner App Name> opens every PDF by default, then you need to clear the app's “Open by default” settings:

1. Open the Settings app.

2. Tap “Apps & notifications”.

3. Tap <Partner App Name>. If you don't see it, first tap “See all apps” or “App info”.

4. Tap “Advanced” > “Open by default” > “Clear defaults”. If you don't see “Advanced”, tap “Open by default” > “Clear defaults”

After clearing the default, when you open a PDF again, your device will ask you which app to use.

The app opens every %1$s by default. To clear this setting tap on “Clear defaults” and follow these steps:\n\nTap “Advanced” > “Open by default” > “Clear defaults”. If you don\'t see “Advanced”, tap “Open by default” > “Clear defaults”.
